title: ICE while casting to iface

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
The mostly relevant code is available at https://gist.github.com/3107024.

Here's the backtrace:

